job_description:
GumGum is a contextual-first, global digital advertising platform that uses advanced AI technology to serve captivating creative ads that drive consumer attention, without the use of personal data. At GumGum, we don't need to know who you are to deliver relevant and engaging ads that align with your active frame of mind. We believe that a digital advertising industry based on context rather than personal data builds a more equitable and less invasive future for the internet and is better for consumers, publishers and advertisers alike. Our blueprint for the future, The Mindset Matrix™, combines the power of context and creative in digital advertising to deliver superior attention and drive consumer action without sacrificing personal data.

To be a part of this next phase of digital advertising that prioritizes data privacy, please visit www.gumgum.com/careers
We are looking for an Intern to join our exciting and fast paced Publisher Success Team, ideally for a period of 6 - 12 months. The responsibilities of the Intern will be to work closely with the Publisher Success Team to manage all client partnerships. This is a paid internship.

This is an exciting opportunity to be part of a close-knit Team who all support and help one another to grow and learn. It is a great opportunity to learn more about Ad Tech, Digital Publishing and Digital Advertising buying and selling, across all European markets.

Note: GumGum currently operates in a 'work from home' virtual environment with sporadic opportunities for in-person business and morale events (health guidelines permitting). There will not be any requirement to go into the office on a daily basis moving forward.

What You'll Achieve

Support the Publisher Development Team with managing client accounts
Plan, coordinate and execute assigned tasks
Create reliable dashboards and reports useful for our Publisher Success Team
Collect and analyse data to understand inventory and performance
Various projects involving data entry, analytics and internal/external communication

Skills You'll Bring

Currently enrolled in studies within the EU (needs to be registered as student for the whole duration of the internship)
Interest in Ad Tech, Digital Publishing and/or Digital Advertising
Can-do mentality
Flexible and proactive in taking on assignments and responsibilities
Ability to manage multiple deadline-driven tasks at once
Confident communicator
Excellent analytical and reporting skills
Data driven and fast learner
Inclusive team player
Excel-Savvy and ability to leverage analytical tools (e.g., Excel and Google Analytics) would be a big plus!
Great eye for detail and organised
Able to prepare collateral for our team to present internally and externally
Available to start as soon as possible
Fluent in English. Other languages such as French, German or Spanish are a plus

Perks & Benefits

25* Days Paid Holidays for Full-Time employees + plus bank holidays
Office commute costs
Employee Assistance Program
GumGum Gives Back volunteering/social impact opportunities*
Virtual and in-person company events/celebrations
Anniversary recognition and awards
Modern Family Support and Resources

Prorated if worked less than a year or/and full time
Awards

BuiltIn #37 Best Places to Work 2023 across the United States
BuiltinLA #7 Best Places to Work 2022
BuiltinLA Best Places to Work 2021
Ad Exchanger Programmatic Power Player 2022 and 2021
Digiday Media Awards Europe finalist 2022 and 2021

GumGum is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. At GumGum, we believe in cultivating an environment where our team members can bring their authentic, whole selves to work. Encouraging identity and belonging is one of the many aspects of our culture that makes us stronger as an organization and drives innovation. We are committed to building and delivering a diverse, inclusive, and equitable workforce that is representative of the world around us, where all individuals are treated with respect and dignity - and to act swiftly if this value is ever threatened. We are constantly striving to be better, and we continue to take strategic steps to advance representation. - Phil Schraeder, CEO

Learn more about our DEIB programming at gumgum.com/deib

Follow us on our socials...

Instagram: @gumgum & @dogsofgumgum
LinkedIn: GumGum
Tweet us: @gumgum
Facebook: GumGum
pros:
["- Very global company. team members all over - Product seems really compelling and has a good reputation with clients - good focus on DEI and hearing from lots of different people in the company - good culture internally and lots to do outside of your day job organized by the company. I haven't worked anywhere with as many great ways to hang out with the team.", 'Great Company Culture Great Company Benefits Great Company Compensation Great Work Life Balance Great Work Leadership Remote Work', 'The only pros I can provide are the friendships that I made during my time at gumgum.', 'Some nice perks, but not the salary', "GumGum is an incredible and refreshing organization.

The company does advertising technology without third party cookies but instead uses contextual technology (natural language processing, Artificial intelliegence, machine learning) to understand a website's message and context and render relevant ads. Doing this instead of tracking user activity on the internet is without a doubt the future of digital advertising due to both a better more ethical method and third party cookies being eliminated next year without many alternatives. 

This is amazing and unheard of in adtech to render advertisements without that separates GumGum from any other adtech company in that we don't track individual activity. 

That huge opportunity combined with an incredible inclusive environment has made GumGum a really special place for me personally.

Also the perks and benefits are very strong.", 'GumGum was an amazing company to be a part of. So much fun and so many brilliant minds. I was lucky to be able to work with such a driven company and team. The People Ops team was the best! I learned a lot from everyone and will always be grateful for it all.', '- Excellent management team
- Great culture
- Amazing growth prospects', 'Great benefits
Fantastic culture
Very progressive and supportive to minorities
Tech is great']
cons: ["- Leadership team doesn't always seem aligned on what's important so there can be some politics between different departments - There is always a lot going on and it can be a little hectic", 'I have absolutely no cons for GumGum', 'I cannot speak to what this company is now, I can only base this on my time pre 2021 and some years back. I would not recommend working for this company. Petty and inexperienced management. Lured in smart people with the promise of chic office views a few blocks from the beach, stocked kitchens, and career growth. Could only deliver on the first two unless you were above a certain level or had been there x number of years, in which case yearly promotions or raises were almost guaranteed.', '- brought in some senior leaders who are totally changing the culture here (and not for the better) - far too old school for a "hip" company - nothing super unique in terms of ad tech, misleading clients - colleagues seem stressed in all departments - let people go with little notice during the pandemic and continue to let people go for no real reason - your voice won\'t be heard', "We acquired two companies in the last year. On one hand it's really exciting but has also created a lot of changes fast.", 'Workload was nuts! It really did test you on your grit and adaptability though. Sometimes it felt over-working was the culture but I know that was being assessed around the time I was heading out.', 'Nothing significant you would not expect from a high growth company', 'It’s a startup that is expanding so expect fast paced and lack of process but the organization is self aware and working on addressing these issues in smart way']

job_description: LET OP: we behandelen alleen sollicitaties waarbij een motivatiebrief en CV zijn inbegrepen!Wil jij de wereld veroveren met jouw verhalen? Dan is Publab Media Group op zoek naar jou! Wij zijn op zoek naar een getalenteerde storyteller die met zijn/haar creatieve pen onze verhalen tot leven kan brengen.Publab Media Group is een online publisher met de missie om mensen te inspireren en te entertainen middels digitale media. Als jong, dynamisch bedrijf stimuleren we graag een goede balans tussen werk en privé, zodat jij de baas bent over de kwaliteit van je werk. Tijdens ons eerste gesprek vertellen we je hier graag meer over. Middels een portfolio aan websites hebben we een wereldwijd bereik en maandelijks miljoenen bezoekers.Als storyteller bij Publab Media Group ben je verantwoordelijk voor het schrijven van long-form artikelen. Hierbij kun je denken aan zowel fictieve als non-fictieve verhalen die variëren van onderwerpen zoals entertainment, lifestyle, wetenschap, technologie en nog veel meer. Het is jouw taak om de lezers te betrekken en te inspireren door het creëren van een unieke en meeslepende schrijfstijl.Je beheerst niet alleen de Engelse taal tot in de puntjes, maar ook deadlines zijn voor jou geen probleem. Je bent in staat om zelfstandig te werken en om te gaan met feedback. Daarnaast kun je goed werken met afbeeldingen en beschik je over de nodige vaardigheden in programma's zoals Photoshop.Bij ons krijg je de kans om jouw creatieve talenten te ontwikkelen en jezelf verder te ontplooien als schrijver. Of je nu vanuit huis of op kantoor wilt werken, we bieden je de flexibiliteit om jouw eigen werktijden in te delen en om jouw persoonlijke werkplek in te richten zoals jij dat wilt.Word jij onze nieuwe storyteller? Stuur dan jouw CV en een korte motivatiebrief naar ons toe en wie weet werk jij binnenkort aan de meest inspirerende verhalen!VerantwoordelijkhedenHet schrijven/creëren van quality content in het Engels en Nederlands;Het zoeken/creëren van passende, visuele versterkingen van teksten;Je leert werken met verschillende AI-software;Flexibel meebewegen met veranderingen binnen onze markt/doelgroepen.Profiel en ervaringAantoonbare ervaring met het creëren van online content;Geen drempel qua werkervaring;Kritisch en georganiseerd kunnen werken;Kennis van en ervaring met Photoshop;Beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal in woord en geschrift;Goede communicatieve vaardigheden (je komt in een klein team te werken);Gevoel voor de tone-of-voice van je doelgroep;Wat bieden wij?Een goed startsalaris met uitzicht op bonussen en/of salarisverhoging;Mogelijkheid om fulltime of parttime in dienst te komen (in overleg);Een remote werkplek voorzien van alle gemakken;Budget en tools voor zelfontwikkeling;Een omgeving waar je flexibel je werkplek en werktijden kunt bepalen;Een team van mensen die jou op alle manieren willen ondersteunen om het beste uit jezelf en je werkzaamheden te halen;Soort dienstverband: Fulltime, ParttimeParttime uren: 40 per weekSalaris: Vanaf €2.500,00 per maandRooster:Flexibele werkurenSecundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden:BedrijfsfitnessBudget voor professionele ontwikkelingExtra vakantiedagenFlexibele werkurenWerk vanuit huisSoorten aanvullende vergoedingen:VakantiegeldWerklocatie: ThuiswerkenDeadline sollicitaties: 15-03-2023Verwachte startdatum: 01-04-2023

People here personify that rare combination of qualities where they are both skilled, inspiring an enjoyable to work with - both leadership and employees.

cons: ["There are actually too many to list. The working atmosphere is spoiled by the founder who sits on his monkey rock like a dictator and does not give anyone room to think otherwise. This gentleman is a terror to your self-esteem and everything you stand for. Don't go here.", "A lot of change (or looking at it as a pro: new opportunities), as the industry is still transitioning. If you like the idea of making an impact, this is great, but if you want to settle into a comfortable, strictly defined role, this isn't the place.", '-Small company: if you want a big reach and big-name know outside the programmatic environment, this is not the place.', "I don't really have any to mention.", 'Very demanding company, a non hierarchy organization has that issue, you are your own manager and you have to set up your own goals. Being pro-active and curious is a must. On the other hand everybody is willing to help you when you ask the right questions', 'Massarius is in a constantly changing environment, so you have to be up to date about the trends in online advertising. This take time', 'The industry changes very frequently', '- Too many eggs in too many baskets\r\n- Very aggressive and negative termination procedure \r\n- No compensation for extra hours (which occurred more often than not)']

job_description:
Who we are

We are gospooky. An incredibly fast-moving bunch of unconventional storytellers, social media superstars and slam-dunking creatives. We know all things internet culture and create scroll-stopping content people actually want to share. One thing we all have in common: we’re always on the lookout for attention.
So here’s the thing. We’re constantly on the hunt for like-minded talent – folks that live for inventing and executing awesome ideas. We need people who aren’t afraid to try new things, the ones who spot a new feature in the morning and have it implemented by the afternoon. We love passionate designers and video creators, disruptive artists and illustrators, and people who can shake up social media.
So, wanna join us?
The Action

Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams to develop the best creative & innovative ideas that hits all criteria (client briefs, feedback, KPIs)
Create and produce international social first ideas and campaigns across all channels and media.
Present and pitch at all levels - from senior global clients and new biz to agency and creative leaders.


You as a Creative...

Have a hunger for all things social, digital and creative.
Have a keen interest in new platforms, technologies and innovation across our industry and the creative landscape.
Have at least 3 years of international experience in a creative agency, social platform, publisher or similar environment.
Have experience in successfully leading creative briefs to creative executions.
Are an inspirational presenter (internal & external).


What's in it for you?

Flexible holiday policy with a minimum of 25 days meaning you take your rest when you need it
Pension contribution as a percentage of your salary
A company partnership with OpenUp making professional help accessible to all to support your mental wellbeing
Commuting costs reimbursed

Opportunities to develop yourself working alongside a talented team
Phone costs reimbursed if your job calls for a lot of jabbering

Gosloopy, our very own Spooky boat, to enjoy the Amsterdam canals in the summer


How to apply for the job:

If all this sounds great to you, then we'd love to hear from you! However, before you hit the apply button, keep in mind that submitting a portfolio is mandatory for the selection process. Thanks!


Please note a valid EU work permit is required for this role.
gospooky is an equal opportunities employer. Our hiring decisions are based on objective measures and we will not discriminate against any aspect of your identity. We believe that a diverse team is crucial to our collective success and value an inclusive culture where everyone can make their impact and bring their true unique selves to work.

Full-time / Part-time · Hub Amsterdam
Als Creative Linkbuilding Specialist speel je..

een sleutelrol bij het vervullen en ontzorgen van onze

topopdrachtgevers in het bedenken en uitvoeren van de meest creatieve linkbuilding strategieën! Onze unieke aanpak heeft ervoor gezorgd dat we veel klanten in het topsegment aan ons gebonden hebben én zodoende bekend staan als strategisch partner binnen deze dienstverlening. Ter versterking van het team zoeken we een professional die idealiter al over enige werkervaring beschikt in een soortgelijke rol, maar we staan ook open voor een ambitieuze starter die we het vak nog helemaal eigen kunnen maken!

Als Creative Linkbuilding Specialist ben je verantwoordelijk voor het identificeren en verkrijgen van hoogwaardige links om de zichtbaarheid en betrouwbaarheid van de websites van onze relaties te vergroten. Dit vergt onder andere een ondernemende instelling waarbij je het vermogen hebt om creatieve concepten om te zetten in optimaal presterende websites. Je benaderd publishers, redacteurs en journalisten en weet als geen ander uit te leggen waarom het interessant is voor hun publiek. Nadat je de strategie hebt bepaald, zet jij je creativiteit, overtuigingskracht en communicatieve vaardigheden in om deze links te realiseren.

Creative linkbuilding omvat een grote verscheidenheid aan technieken waarmee nieuwe creatieve verwijzingen verkregen kunnen worden. Dit zijn vaak verwijzingen die niet via handmatige linkbuilding of media buying kunnen worden gerealiseerd.

Wat breng je mee?

Allereerst zijn wij op zoek naar een professional die gemotiveerd is zichzelf verder te ontwikkelen binnen de 'digitale wereld'. Idealiter heb je enige ervaring óf affiniteit met SEO / Linkbuilding. Verder herken je jezelf in:

Ervaring met het schrijven van artikelen en/of een journalistieke achtergrond is een pré
Creatief en ‘in mogelijkheden’ denken zit in jouw natuur;
Sterke aandacht voor detail en het vermogen om zelfstandig te werken;
Leergierig, er valt enorm veel te ontdekken in de SEO wereld
Gestructureerd: het continueren van de afdeling vraagt om een gestructureerde aanpak;
Vrijheid, verantwoordelijkheid en vertrouwen..

Dat zijn niet alleen onze kernwaarden, maar ook de basisingrediënten voor een succesvolle samenwerking. We gaan uit van vertrouwen. Bij Happy Horizon krijg én neem je de vrijheid om zaken te regelen zodat het werkt voor jezelf, je team en onze klanten. Wij durven onze verantwoordelijkheid te pakken en beslissingen te nemen. En dat verwachten we dus ook van jou. Gelukkig is dat voor jou vanzelfsprekend toch? ;)

Djamilla

Teamlead

Jordi

Business Development

Niels

Managing Director

Jij?

Creative Linkbuilding Specialist

Wat kan je van ons verwachten?

Werken bij Happy Horizon betekent dat je terecht komt in een omgeving met tal van kansen op verschillende vlakken. Onze wereld is dynamisch en staat nooit stil. Samen ontdekken we jouw horizon en de weg daar naartoe. Daarnaast bieden wij:

Geld natuurlijk. Maar daarnaast nog veel meer   
Aandacht voor persoonlijke ontwikkeling via ons Groeihuis 
Een inspirerende werkomgeving waarin innovatie, samenwerking, plezier en resultaat centraal staan   
Flexibele werktijden met de mogelijkheid om structureel vanuit huis te werken   
Werken aan verschillende projecten met een diversiteit aan uitdagingen en specialismen   
Enthousiaste collega's, waarbij veel ruimte is voor eigen ideeën en waar je bijdrage werkelijk op prijs wordt gesteld   
Mogelijkheden om je te blijven ontwikkelen door ons speciaal ontwikkelde talentprogramma   
Interesse?

Zit je inmiddels op het puntje van je stoel? Of voel je gewoon dat deze functie jou op het lijf is geschreven? Stuur dan je CV via een van onderstaande opties naar Willem. En die motivatiebrief? Niet verplicht, maar verras ons vooral met een creatieve sollicitatie ;-)

   willempeters@happyhorizon.com
   06 39 04 75 03

Toch nog even een vraagje..

Heb je nog vragen of ben je nieuwsgierig naar iets? Mail, Whatsapp of bel Willem dan even. Vindt hij nog gezellig ook.

Multitubes in Wormerveer is de enige producent van kunststof tubes in de Benelux.

Met meer dan 140 medewerkers en vestigingen in Nederland en België, zijn wij een van

de marktleiders in Europa. Onze producten kom je tegen in bijna elke bouwmarkt,

supermarkt, drogisterij en apotheek.

Vanwege uitbreiding van ons DTP team zijn wij op zoek naar een:

(TECHNISCH) DESKTOP

PUBLISHER (M/V)

32/40 UUR PER WEEK

De functie en wie jij bent;
• Alles wat met grafische industrie te maken heeft vind jij mooi.
Je hebt een grafische opleiding en een aantal jaren ervaring met druktechnische werkvoorbe-
reiding en het pre-press systeem dat daarbij hoort.
Alles wat met offset- flexo- en zeefdruk te maken heeft kun jij dromen.Je hebt oog voor detail en gaat altijd voor het perfecte eindresultaat.Jij begrijpt het belang van de perfecte druktechnische voorbereiding om er voor te zorgen dat
jouw collega’s in de drukkerij elke dag weer fantastische drukbeelden weten te realiseren.
Adobe CC, Illustrator, Photoshop, Indesign en Acrobat hebben geen geheimen voor jou.Je werkt samen met het customer service team van meerdere vestigingen en begrijpt zowel
de wensen van de klant als de kunst om aangeleverd artwork slim te vertalen

naar een perfect drukproces.
Mac os X is al jarenlang jouw trouwe collega.
Wat bieden wij?
• Korte lijnen, een goed salaris en flexibiliteit tussen thuis en op locatie werken.

Een aangename werkomgeving op locatie binnen een solide en groeiend bedrijf waar vrijheid
en flexibiliteit de norm zijn.

Ben jij enthousiast geworden over de vacature?

Stuur dan snel je C.V. naar: vacatures@multitubes.com
Mocht je aan een van bovenstaande punten niet voldoen maar ben je er toch van overtuigd dat

jij wel de juiste persoon voor deze job bent aarzel dan niet alsnog contact op te nemen!

job_titles: BDM / Account Manager - B2B Contract Publisher (Part
job_description:
Do you have media sales experience?

Like the idea of selling print, digital and event (virtual/physical) solutions to businesses across the built environment sector?

Looking to work from home?

If yes, please read on....

The Company

A small, friendly and niche media company with a number of contract publishing agreements in place, to produce and monetise publications, websites and events for various industry bodies and associations across the built environment sector. Their teams work remotely but can use the London office for meetings/working if they choose.

The Role of BDM / Account Manager

Your role will be a combination of new and existing business, selling print and digital advertising and content solutions as well as thought leadership around virtual and physical events. There is a lot of cross-selling as their brands are quite complementary to one another and so you will be someone capable of having consultative conversations.

Clients range from construction tech firms, through to material and equipment manufacturers, training companies, consultancies and similar.

The £30k basic salary is potentially flexible and the client will also consider more experienced candidates who would be prepared to work 3-4 days a week for the same salary.

Requirements for this BDM / Account Manager role

Media sales experience (including digital)
Confident, articulate and trustworthy
Stable career history
Able to work from home

If you feel that you tick the boxes, please apply and a consultant will be in touch.
pros:
['Media IQ has a strong reputation in the Media industry, providing quality talent to the major B2C & B2B Media Owners and Ad-Tech businesses in the UK. 

The key to this was that each consultant commits to ensuring that the right candidates are sent to each client. There are no interview targets, so it allows the Consultants to avoid sending the wrong candidates just to make the numbers.

Each Consultant also had extensive personal networks, allowing them to be sure they were contacting the right candidate pool when relevant new jobs were available.

It was a very refreshing environment to be confident that we were acting in a truly consultative manner to both the candidate and client communities, as opposed to flying out as many CVs as possible and "hoping one sticks"']
cons: ['Non-Central London location was sometimes challenging when visiting clients and candidates, however I believe the business has recently relocated to Central London']

job_description:
We zijn op zoek naar een nieuwe Online Content Publisher/SEO/SEA Specialist. Het is een afwisselende functie waarbij deze beide aspecten van online marketing samen komen. Hierdoor word je een breed inzetbare online specialist die exact weet hoe je moet publiceren en hoe je online vindbaar kunt zijn. Je komt te werken in een klein team waarbij veel ruimte is voor eigen inbreng en snel geschakeld wordt.
Je zult je bezig houden met de volgende kerntaken:
Online publiceren van producten
Algemeen beheer online productassortiment
Schrijven van productteksten
Schrijven van overige websiteteksten
SEO
SEA (Adwords)

Vaardigheden:
Teamplayer
Oog voor taal (schrijfvaardigheden)
Commerciële denkwijze
Enige ervaring met SEO/SEA (niet verplicht)
Interesse in online marketing
Zelfstandig kunnen werken

We bieden je een marktconform salaris en een informele maar ambitieuze werksfeer. Spreekt bovenstaande omschrijving je aan en beschik je over de juiste vaardigheden? Solliciteer bij ons!


Stuur je C.V. en motivatiebrief naar Dit e-mailadres is beschermd tegen spambots. U heeft JavaScript nodig om het te kunnen zien. . We nemen dan zo snel mogelijk contact met je op.

Description
At Cleeng, we’re working each day to enhance the way people consume online TV and videos. Cleeng empowers content owners, broadcasters and publishers to fully embrace the potential of videos! Since our founding in 2011, we’ve been serving global brands such as FIFA, Final Fantasy, One Championship, Foxtel, and the Tennis Channel to monetize their videos through PPV Live and Subscription VOD. We are growing fast and need exceptionally talented, bright, and driven people ready to take up the challenge with us. If you’d like to help us have an impact, this is your chance to make history.
Working at Cleeng is rewarding, fun, and challenging. We thrive on innovation. If you want to join a fast growing business and make a real contribution, come join our team and help shape the future of video consumption.
Responsibilities

Must Have Requirements

Nice To Have Requirements

We offer
A market leading product, in a fast growing business, with still a lot to be shaped, so you can express yourself,
Work with an international team of experts, in Poznan, Philippines, NYC, Amsterdam, who value diversity, hard work, and friendly relationships. 16 nationalities and counting!
Flexible working hours
Possibilities to work remotely
Annual retreats and a lot of integration events
A great, full of energy and an office in the very middle of the city!
Work hard, play hard. For sure, not a boring place, and we want to keep it that way.

Languages English Education Other Experience 0+ years
pros:
["Since joining the company earlier this year, the culture and openness of the organization has been refreshing! Senior Management and leaders are always working closely with their respective teams and give their team members autonomy on their work to help make the company better. Everyone is willing to go out of their way to help each other. 

If you're looking for a place to be challenged every day, do something meaningful and have fun, strongly consider Cleeng!", "- Cleeng acknowledges and respects my effort - Amazing colleagues to work with - Everyday is a learning, you'll be astonished how much great insights you can gain even after 5 years of working with the company - Cleeng trusts me since the first day I joined the organization Always available for career advancement - Possibility of promotion if you deserve it", '- competitive salary
- full benefits
- ability to work remotely
- regular bonuses
- management always ensures proper recognition for individual employee's efforts
- "flat" organizational structure, meaning that management's doors are always open to anyone within the company regardless of your position and there's a general relaxed but professional atmosphere within the organization that focuses on delivering actual results rather than expecting you to fill some sort of quota for the day
- everyone is encouraged to be proactive and resourceful, and to be creative in how to achieve their goals, but you can also count on a tremendous amount of support from more seasoned employees, line managers, or even the management (again, flat structure)
- generally pleasant, welcoming, and supportive atmosphere among the employees, there's an overall air of unity in working towards a common goal, and it's maintained by management and HR through frequent company events, bi-weekly steering meetings, and regular updates regarding quarterly goals and mission statements', 'Amazing corporate culture, constructive and productive meetings, people that one can rely on, encouraging management, great reward system.', 'Great industry, engaged management, company values represent the reality and how people treat each other.', 'Young and energetic staff,
Freedom to choose your projects,
Chance to work with big clients,
Stable employment, 
Good market outlook', '- Great management team
- Fun organisation, family type feel, people care for you and you care for them. 
- I learned a lot from the leadership team.', 'Culture and environment 
Tech stack', 'Good opportunity for Junior/Mid Dev to gain more experience
Friendly people that are open and helpful
Transparency within the higher management team
They care about employees - benefits are really good, integrations events too', 'A very healthy company culture, that encourages engagement, doing your absolute best, supporting one another, and having a life outside your job.']
cons:
['I have none at the moment.', '- Working with Cleeng requires a high level of discipline and patience. If you are easily overwhelmed, this is not the place for you. - Since we are a small organization, you should be more receptive to self-learning and read a great deal of information to keep up with the processes.', '- some internal tools seem a bit outdated
- while client-facing documentation is being given a great deal of care, navigating through internal documentation can be a bit daunting', 'The company is growing fast. One needs to be agile, and have the ability to quickly adapt to growing responsibilities', 'Any critical to be honest...', "The management pretends to listen to the employees but in the end, they don't take their opinion into account,
There is a pressure to work very fast on a lot of things at a time, overall understaffed, 
Many people work long hours, much more than they are paid for,
The money is not great,
There is a lot of processes, many of them do not make much sense,
The management keeps saying how great the company is, how lucky everyone is to be part of this", 'There are no bad sides. The question is do your ambitions fit the organisation in a particular time if not you move on, which was my case.', 'lack of vision was causing demotivation', "Lack of pay transparency - even the job offer lacks information on pay
Some process takes too long that impact on work of others
There is a lack of team spirit inside teams - if some of part is not delivered it's not my problem
Communication with team leaders - they avoid discussion about problems", 'Some salary limitations due to the size and age of the company.']

job_description: (Associate) Publisher - Archaeology and Library & Information Science JournalsWe are looking for a bright and enthusiastic individual to manage and develop the Archaeology and Library & Information Science portfolio within the Social Sciences Journals team. The portfolio is comprised of high-quality society and proprietary international titles - 8 in Archaeology and 5 in LIS, and significant further development is possible in both of these dynamic, expanding fields.The role balances academic research knowledge with a keen interest in new online and Open Access developments as well as a strong sense for relationship management. The Social Sciences journals’ team is currently made up of 4 publishers in Oxford (UK), 2 in London (UK), 3 in Amsterdam and 1 in Beijing. The Publisher role can be based at either the Oxford, London or Amsterdam offices. Please note you must already have a permit to work in one of these locations.Any applicant needs to have a good educational background and keen interest in academic publishing; good communication skills; and would have to be prepared to work somewhat independently from the rest of the immediate team while also contributing to team initiatives as necessary.Key Result AreasPortfolio Management and DevelopmentDevelop the strategy for the portfolio; ensure alignment with the department’s and wider organization’s strategies.Work with editors, authors, editorial boards and the academic community at large to ensure sufficient copy flow of relevant, high-quality manuscripts.Negotiate and manage contractual relationships with journal editors.Continuous and pro-active maintenance of the existing portfolio, matching developments in the external marketplace, including the development of Open Access initiatives.Continuous quality control and monitoring of all aspects of day-to-day editorial, production and publishing operations and actively address improvements where required.Meet portfolio related objectives with regards to content growth, articles market share, citation share, relative impact factor, editorial speeds and author and editor satisfaction.Manage the editorial fees budget and provide input to pricing processes.Relationship Management and NetworkingEstablish, manage and maintain excellent contacts and networks with key external stakeholders, including editors, authors, society representatives, university leadership and industry, with a view to understanding their professional and organizational needs and ongoing market developments.Establish, manage and maintain excellent contacts with key stakeholders within the company, including editorial, production, publishing, marketing and technology teams, coordinating activities as they relate to the portfolio’s needs and development.Business DevelopmentIdentify and map market needs and business opportunities.Develop, and where feasible acquire, new products and services, including society journals and conferences.About you:AttitudeA creative/entrepreneurial/innovative attitude is essentialDrive/result oriented/ initiating attitudeWillingness to travel internationally 30% of the timeIntegrity/commitment to the businessStrong commercial and negotiation skillsWillingness to steer and participate in selective projectsThe ability to build, nurture and manage editorial boards is a must.Establish, manage and maintain excellent contacts and networks with key external and internal stakeholdersFull awareness of applications and up to date with Technology, Social Media and content enhancement in the academic arena.Educational level and experienceUniversity degree - essentialMinimum of 3 years’ publishing experience – desirableFluent English speaker – essential-Elsevier is an equal opportunity employer: qualified applicants are considered for and treated during employment without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, national origin, citizenship status, disability status, protected veteran status, age, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, or any other characteristic protected by law. If a qualified individual with a disability or disabled veteran needs a reasonable accommodation to use or access our online system, that individual should please contact accommodations@relx.com or if you are based in the US you may also contact us on 1.855.833.5120.Please read our Candidate Privacy PolicyJob Type: Full-time
